typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		exp_key as string,
		exp_cost_compensation as string,
		exp_code as string,
		exp_description as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		exg_key as string,
		exg_description as string,
		ext_description as string,
		ext_code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_expense.parquet']) ~> PreDImExpense
PreDImExpense derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Expense Codes') ~> TopLevel
SelAndRenameCols alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
TopLevel aggregate(groupBy(exp_key,
		top_key,
		exp_cost_compensation,
		exp_code,
		exp_description,
		top_description,
		exg_key,
		exg_description,
		ext_code,
		ext_description)) ~> GetDistinctRows
GetDistinctRows select(mapColumn(
		exp_key,
		top_key,
		exp_cost_compensation,
		exp_code,
		exp_description,
		top_description,
		exg_code = exg_key,
		exg_description,
		ext_code,
		ext_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelAndRenameCols
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		exp_key as string,
		top_key as string,
		exp_cost_compensation as string,
		exp_code as string,
		exp_description as string,
		top_description as string,
		exg_code as string,
		exg_description as string,
		ext_code as string,
		ext_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['exp_key'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimExpense
